name: Ice Weave
description:
creates Stable Ice or other Ice types after Free Weaving.

Stable Ice is harmless and visible only to you. It can be picked up and added automatically to your Ice Stores.

If Stable Ice is created in this way within 3m of another Ice type that one will be converted to Stable Ice as well.

Weaving abilities reduce your Ice Stores by one. If your Ice Stores are empty, 250 Mana is drained to create the Ice. If neither cost can be paid, Ice is not woven but Mana is restored instead.

Other Ice types unlocked by Free Weaving:
Cool Ice benefits allies within 10m restoring their native resource over time. This effect stacks.

Frigid Ice harms enemies within 5m over time Dazing them and inflicting 57 - 86 + 70% Weapon Damage. Enemies destroy it on contact taking 201 - 301 + 251% Weapon Damage, becoming Rooted and suffering Ice Buildup. Tripping it again while afflicted with Ice Buildup causes Knockdown.

Refreshing Ice quickly bursts healing allies within 10m for 35 - 43 + 157% Support Power.

Volatile Ice quickly explodes damaging enemies within 5m for 197 - 296 + 247% Weapon Damage.

Your Ice Storage Capacity determines the number of Ice you may have active simultaneously.
